00007 /**
00008  * check if an array of parameters matches certain criterias.
00009  * you can still use the (deprecated) defines of model.php (until i murder you)
00010  *
00011  * @package kata_utility
00012  * @author feldkamp@gameforge.de
00013  */
00014 class ValidateUtility {
00015 
00016     /**
00017      * checks the given values of the array match certain criterias
00018      *
00019      * <code>
00020      * check(array(
00021      * 'email'=>'INT'
00022      * ),$this->params['form'])
00023      * </code>
00024      *
00025      * @param array $how key/value pair. key is the name of the key inside the $what-array, value is a rule, the name of a function that is given the string (should return bool wether the string validates)
00026      * @param array $params the actual data as name=>value array (eg. $this->params['form'])
00027      * @return true if data validates OR $params-key, for example 'EMAIL' if no correct email given OR false if $params is empty
00028      */
00029     function check($how, $params) {
00030         $result = $this->checkAll($how, $params);
00031 
00032         if (!is_array($result))
00033             return $result;
00034         if (is_array($result) && (count($result) == 0))
00035             return false;
00036         return array_shift($result);
00037     }
00038 
00039     /**
00040      * checks the given values of the array match certain criterias
00041      *
00042      * <code>
00043      * check(array(
00044      * 'email'=>'INT'
00045      * ),$this->params['form'])
00046      * </code>
00047      *
00048      * @param array $how key/value pair. key is the name of the key inside the $what-array, value is a rule, the name of a function that is given the string (should return bool wether the string validates)
00049      * @param array $params the actual data as name=>value array (eg. $this->params['form'])
00050      * @return true if data validates OR $params-key, for example 'EMAIL' if no correct email given OR array() if $params is empty
00051      */
00052     function checkAll($how, $params) {
00053         if (!is_array($how)) {
00054             throw new InvalidArgumentException("validateutil: 'how' should be an array");
00055         }
00056         if (!is_array($params) || empty ($params)) {
00057             return array ();
00058         }
00059 
00060         $errors = array ();
00061         foreach ($how as $inpname => $howname) {
00062             // be compatible with old validate
00063             if (substr($howname, 0, 6) == 'VALID_') {
00064                 $howname = substr($howname, 6);
00065             }
00066 
00067             $inpvalue = is($params[$inpname], '');
00068             switch (strtoupper($howname)) {
00069                 case 'NOT_EMPTY' :
00070                     if (empty ($inpvalue))
00071                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00072                     break;
00073                 case 'ALLOW_EMPTY' :
00074                     break;
00075                 case 'ALLOW_MULTI' :
00076                     if (!is_array($inpvalue) || (count($inpvalue) == 0))
00077                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00078                     break;
00079                 case 'ALLOW_MULTI_EMPTY':
00080                     break;
00081                 case 'BOOL' :
00082                     if ($inpvalue != '1' && $inpvalue != '0')
00083                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00084                     break;
00085                 case 'BOOL_LAZY' :
00086                     if ($inpvalue != '1' && $inpvalue != '')
00087                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00088                     break;
00089                 case 'BOOL_TRUE' :
00090                     if ($inpvalue != '1')
00091                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00092                 break;
00093                     case 'FLOAT' :
00094                     if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_FLOAT))
00095                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00096                     break;
00097                 case 'UINT' :
00098                 case 'NUMBER' :
00099                     if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_INT, array (
00100                             'options' => array (
00101                                 'min_range' => 0
00102                             )
00103                         )))
00104                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00105                     break;
00106                 case 'INT' :
00107                     if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_INT))
00108                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00109                     break;
00110                 case 'HEX' :
00111                     if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_INT || FILTER_FLAG_ALLOW_HEX))
00112                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00113                     break;
00114                 case 'EMAIL' :
00115                     if (filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL) === false)
00116                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00117                     break;
00118                 case 'IP' :
00119                     if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_IP))
00120                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00121                     break;
00122                 case 'URL' :
00123                     if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL))
00124                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00125                     break;
00126                 case 'YEAR' :
00127                     if (!is_numeric($inpvalue) || ($inpvalue < 1900) || ($inpvalue > 2099))
00128                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00129                 case function_exists($howname) :
00130                     if (!$howname ($inpname, $inpvalue))
00131                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00132                     break;
00133                 default :
00134                     if (false === strpos($howname, '/')) {
00135                         throw new InvalidArgumentException("validateutil: '$howname' is no rule, function or regex. maybe a typo?");
00136                     }
00137                     if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_REGEXP, array (
00138                             'validate_regexp' => $howname
00139                         )))
00140                         $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00141                     break;
00142             } //switch
00143         } //foreach
00144 
00145         if (empty ($errors)) {
00146             return true;
00147         }
00148 
00149         return $errors;
00150     }
00151 
00152     /**
00153      * check the given parameter-array against the rows of a model
00154      * 
00155      * @param string $modelname name of the model to validate against
00156      * @param array $params the actual data as name=>value array (eg. $this->params['form'])
00157      * @return true if data validates OR $params-key, for example 'EMAIL' if no correct email given OR array() if $params is empty
00158      */
00159     function checkAllWithModel($modelname, $params) {
00160         $model = getModel($modelname);
00161         $describe = $model->describe($model->getTableName(null, true, false));
00162         $valArray = array ();
00163 
00164         //remove primary key 
00165         if (isset ($describe['identity'])) {
00166             unset ($describe['cols'][$describe['identity']]);
00167         }
00168 
00169         foreach ($describe['cols'] as $colname => $coldata) {
00170             switch ($coldata['type']) {
00171                 case 'int' :
00172                     $valArray[$colname] = 'INT';
00173                     break;
00174                 case 'string' :
00175                 case 'text' :
00176                     $valArray[$colname] = 'NOT_EMPTY';
00177                     break;
00178                 case 'bool' :
00179                     $valArray[$colname] = 'BOOL';
00180                     break;
00181                 case 'float' :
00182                     $valArray[$colname] = 'FLOAT';
00183                     break;
00184                 default :
00185                     //TODO support more stuff
00186                     throw new InvalidArgumentException("validateModel: no support (yet) for " . $coldata['type']);
00187             }
00188         }
00189 
00190         return $this->checkAll($valArray, $params);
00191     }
00192 
00193 }
